name: Sasaran
query:
SELECT
   `tabSasaran`.name as "ID :Link/Sasaran:80",
   `tabSasaran`.id_kajian_risiko as "Kajian Risiko :Link/Kajian Risiko",
   `tabSasaran`.organisasi as "Organisasi :Select",
   `tabSasaran`.deskripsi_sasaran as "Sasaran :Data",
   `tabSasaran`.unit_kerja as "Unit Kerja :Link/Unit Kerja",
   `tabSasaran`.direktorat_pemilik_sasaran as "Direktorat Pemilik Sasaran :Link/Direktorat",
   `tabSasaran`.divisi_pemilik_sasaran as "Divisi Pemilik Sasaran :Link/Divisi",
   `tabSasaran`.indikator_kinerja_sasaran_iks as "Indikator Kinerja Sasaran :Link/Indikator Kinerja Sasaran",
   `tabSasaran`.satuan_indikator_kinerja as "Satuan Indikator Kinerja Sasaran :Link/Satuan Indikator Kinerja Sasaran",
   `tabSasaran`.target_iks as "Target Indikator Kinerja Sasaran :Data"
FROM
  `tabSasaran`
WHERE `tabSasaran`.organisasi = %(organisasi)s OR  `tabSasaran`.unit_kerja = %(unit_kerja)s
